title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Minimum Conditions for Examining of Vegetable Species) (Amendment) 
(No.2) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) (amendment) (no.2) regulation 2023

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of 
Vegetable Species) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 121 of 2004) are amended by 
substituting in Regulation 2 for the definition of “Directive” (as amended by 
European Communities (Minimum Conditions for examining of Vegetable 
Species) (Amendment) (No 2) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 286 of 2023) the 
following- 

“‘Directive’ means Commission Directive No. 2003/91/EC of 6 October 
20032 as amended by Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 
2023/1438 of 10th July 2023;”.
text_norm: 2 european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) regulation 2004 (s.i no 121 2004) amended substituting regulation 2 definition directive (as amended european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) (amendment) (no 2) regulation 2023 (s.i no 286 2023) following- directive mean commission directive no 2003 91 ec 6 october 20032 amended commission implementing directive (eu) 2023 1438 10th july 2023

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of
text_raw:
3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of 
Vegetable Species) (Amendment) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 286 of 2023) are 
revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 October, 2023. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine.. 

1 O.J. No. L176, 11.07.2023, p. 17 

2 O.J. No. L254, 08.10.2003, p. 11 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 31st October, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [519] 3

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2023/1438 of 10 July 2023 which amends Council Directive 
2003/91/EC as regards a derogation for the CPVO and UPOV updated protocols, 
in particular as regards hemp, garlic, kohlrabi, leaf chicory, watermelon and 
turnip. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [519]
